work.name: Oracle India Private Limited
work.summary: Re-engineered Oracle Blockchain Platform and developed MicroTx for distributed transactions
highlights: Redesigned on-premise architecture to cloud-based Kubernetes architecture
Developed MicroTx achieving 2200 transactions per second

work.summary: Implemented server-driven UI system and developed data browsing features for HANA database browser tool

projects.name: Future Video Frame Prediction
projects.summary: Predicted the 22nd frame of a video featuring moving objects using UNet architecture and Masked Conditional Video Diffusion

projects.name: Image Geolocation
projects.summary: Developed an advanced image geolocation system using CLIP and RAG techniques
highlights: Implemented novel hierarchical feature clustering approach
Achieved up to 85.08% accuracy at continent level and 15.01% at street level

projects.name: Cola Kernels
projects.summary: custom CUDA kernels for Compositional Linear Algebra framework}, focusing on Arnoldi iteration, Cholesky decomposition, Hutchinson trace estimation, and SVD
highlights: Achieved up to 5x speedup and reduced memory usage by 8x compared to PyTorch implementation.

projects.name: Enhanced AODV
projects.summary: Implemented an algorithm to improve communication efficiency among mobile devices in an ad-hoc network
